title: Columbia Mens Bonehead Long Sleeve Shirt
description: MADE FOR FISHING: Simple yet quietly technical, this Performance Fishing Gear features nice touches, like a rod holder and gear loop to help you prepare your next lure while keeping you in style indoors or out.
100% COTTON: Made from durable cotton poplin, this shirt provides breathable comfort that gets more comfortable with age.
BUTTON-UP STYLE: Button adjustable cuffs with roll-up sleeves and tab holders, while a button-down collar adds style.
SUMMERTIME BREEZE: Ready for the heat, this versatile shirt incorporates a vented back to help keep you cool when you need it most.

BUILT TO LAST: Columbia’s attention to detail is what sets our apparel apart. Specifying only the highest quality materials, expert stitching, and craftsmanship. This is a long-lasting garment you will enjoy for seasons to come.
